00040 #include "beingmanager.h"
00041 #include "being.h"
00042 
00043 #include "graphics/graphics.h"

00045 namespace ST
00046 {
00047     BeingManager::BeingManager()
00048     {
00049 
00050     }
00051 
00052     BeingManager::~BeingManager()
00053     {
00054         BeingIterator itr = mBeingMap.begin(), itr_end = mBeingMap.end();
00055         while (itr != itr_end)
00056         {
00057             delete itr->second;
00058             ++itr;
00059         }
00060         mBeingMap.clear();
00061     }
00062 
00063     Being* BeingManager::findBeing(unsigned int id)
00064     {
00065         BeingIterator itr = mBeingMap.find(id);
00066         if (itr != mBeingMap.end())
00067         {
00068             return itr->second;
00069         }
00070         return NULL;
00071     }
00072 
00073     Being* BeingManager::findBeing(const std::string &name)
00074     {
00075         BeingIterator itr = mBeingMap.begin(), itr_end = mBeingMap.end();
00076         while (itr != itr_end)
00077         {
00078             if (itr->second->getName() == name)
00079             {
00080                 return itr->second;
00081             }
00082 
00083             ++itr;
00084         }
00085 
00086         return NULL;
00087     }
00088 
00089     Being* BeingManager::findBeing(int x, int y)
00090     {
00091         BeingIterator itr = mBeingMap.begin(), itr_end = mBeingMap.end();
00092         while (itr != itr_end)
00093         {
00094             Point pt = itr->second->getTilePosition();
00095             if (pt.x == x && pt.y == y)
00096             {
00097                 return itr->second;
00098             }
00099 
00100             ++itr;
00101         }
00102 
00103         return NULL;
00104     }
00105 
00106     void BeingManager::addBeing(Being *being)
00107     {
00108         mBeingMap.insert(std::pair<unsigned int, Being*>(being->getId(), being));
00109     }
00110 
00111     void BeingManager::saveBeingPosition(unsigned int id, int x, int y)
00112     {
00113         Point pt;
00114         pt.x = x;
00115         pt.y = y;
00116         mPositionMap.insert(std::pair<unsigned int, Point>(id, pt));
00117     }
00118 
00119     Point BeingManager::getSavedPosition(unsigned int id)
00120     {
00121         Point pt;
00122         pt.x = 0;
00123         pt.y = 0;
00124 
00125         PositionIterator itr = mPositionMap.find(id);
00126 
00127         if (itr != mPositionMap.end())
00128         {
00129             pt = itr->second;
00130         }
00131 
00132         return pt;
00133     }
00134 
00135     void BeingManager::removeBeing(unsigned int id)
00136     {
00137         BeingIterator itr = mBeingMap.find(id);
00138         if (itr != mBeingMap.end())
00139         {
00140             graphicsEngine->removeNode(itr->second);
00141             delete itr->second;
00142             mBeingMap.erase(itr);
00143         }
00144     }
00145 
00146     void BeingManager::logic(int ms)
00147     {
00148         BeingIterator itr = mBeingMap.begin(), itr_end = mBeingMap.end();
00149         while (itr != itr_end)
00150         {
00151             itr->second->logic(ms);
00152             ++itr;
00153         }
00154     }
00155 }
